de.hochschule.bremen.minerva.client.ui.gui.controls
Class MArmyCountIcon

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  de.hochschule.bremen.minerva.client.ui.gui.controls.MArmyCountIcon
All Implemented Interfaces:
MControl, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class MArmyCountIcon
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements MControl

Represents a filled circle with an army count which is placed on each country. It also has the color of the player owning the country. It can be marked with circle in a designated color.

Since:
1.0
Version:
$Id: MArmyCountIcon.java 674 2010-07-04 16:34:12Z andre.koenig $
